publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-366 David Whitton: East Dunbartonshire Social Work Serviceâ€”That the Parliament congratulates the Intensive Support and Monitoring Service team of East Dunbartonshire Council Social Work Services on being awarded the 2007 Care Accolade from the Scottish Social Service Council for the initiatives that promote integrated working which improve services and notes that the services it provides on a daily basis are much valued by the people of Strathkelvin and Bearsden and should be given the highest praise.

S3M-366 East Dunbartonshire Social Work Service (lodged on 16 August 2007) Charlie Gordon*, Mary Scanlon*, Des McNulty*, Jackie Baillie*, Robin Harper*, Karen Gillon*, Elaine Smith*, Ken Macintosh*, Kenneth Gibson*, James Kelly*
S3M-366 East Dunbartonshire Social Work Service (lodged on 16 August 2007) Stuart McMillan*, Trish Godman*, Angela Constance*, George Foulkes*
S3M-366 East Dunbartonshire Social Work Service (lodged on 16 August 2007) Cathie Craigie*
